column4: Hello! I am trying to install ubuntu using the wubi(windows based ubuntu installer), entering my password, size 8 gb and wich harddrive i want it installed on. but when i start the installation it cant download something and the installation stops.. can someone please help me out
wubi is really not reccomended. (and i dont use it) but you may want to try to defrag/scandisk the windows drive. then try the installer again
and you do have 8gb of free space right?
